entities: UN Security Council Committee established pursuant to resolution 1572 (2004)
Group of Experts established pursuant to resolution 1584 (2005)
summary:
The Security Council,
 
Recalling previous resolutions on Côte d’Ivoire, 

Commending the Committee and Group of Experts' work, 

Having considered reports on Côte d’Ivoire, 

Noting the Government's views on lifting sanctions, 

Recalling its decision to review measures, 

Welcoming progress in Côte d’Ivoire's stabilization, 

 
1. Decides to terminate with immediate effect, measures on arms, travel and financial sanctions; 
2. Decides to dissolve with immediate effect, the Committee and Group of Experts.
